author: wn.com
title: Automating big-data analysis (MIT - Massachusetts Institute of Technology)
text: ( Source : MIT - Massachusetts Institute of Technology ) Big-data analysis consists of searching for buried patterns that have some kind of predictive power. But choosing which 'features' of the data to analyze usually requires some human
